page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE 10
page.content: At the week-end the children and my husband are at home as ther is no school and most offices are shut. We sometimes go swimming on Saturday morning and then come home and do various jobs around the house or garden to try to keep our property looking reasonable. In the Summer this includes weeding the flower beds, cutting the grass,stacking the wood which we have delivered for the winter painting the outside of the house, cleaning the windows and any other jobs which may need doing. Once a fortnight we have a service in our village Church.My husband is a churchwarden and we all attend the service which is held at 9.00a.m.This is a Holy Communion Service. Every Sunday the children attend Sunday School at the shared church in Hamstreet.
